resources.string: Use your Google plus account to login

"Review:\n\n""It is a complete bakery I must say. They have lots of varieties on the menu." "A var variety of chicken items, burgers, pizzas, cakes, etc. It is a hangout place which is " "usually crowded by the students from near by colleges. One of the places at Himayathnagar where" "you can satisfy your hunger at cheap rates. No need to worry about the quality. The best thing is" "they serve onion slices with your order. " "The bakery is located at the Himayathnagar circle at signal. The ambience is not so bad with decent look and " "comfortable seatings. The service is pretty quick and staff is super friendly. Parking is available for both two wheelers" "and four wheelers at down the cellar."
"Overall, it is one of the oldest and famous bakery in the area and it's charm is still present even as the competition " "has increased in the area with the opening of fast food giants."
